sys_ux_client_script.name: language_dropdown/configAria

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_526a7d0e972971503c39f757f053af60
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Knowledge View">a16a7dca972971503c39f757f053af74</macroponent><name>language_dropdown/configAria</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api
}) {
	if (!api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails || !api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails.languageInfo)
		return; 

	let languageInformation = api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails.languageInfo;
    let languages = languageInformation.langVersions;
    let selectedLanguageId = languageInformation.selectedLangVersion;
    let selectedLanguage = languages.find(language => language.id == selectedLanguageId);
    let value = '';

	if(selectedLanguage)
		 value = "Language " + selectedLanguage.label + ", Select to choose other available languages of the article";
    
    return {
        "aria-label": value
    };
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-29 11:53:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>526a7d0e972971503c39f757f053af60</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>language_dropdown/configAria</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Magdas House" source="x_1027698_magdas_0">a70c2255972d7d103c39f757f053afe8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Magdas House">a70c2255972d7d103c39f757f053afe8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_526a7d0e972971503c39f757f053af60</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-29 11:53:22</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
